header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends

from Cavtat to Dubrovnik it's eighteen kilometres and you've got the option of either getting the bus for a few euros it's twenty-five minutes by road to Dubrovnik erm or getting the boat and that's eight euros but I I like going on boats does everybody else like going on boats?
oh well yeah I think so
but erm you know? you you can mix it up can't you? if you want to go to Dubrovnik for a few days you could do once by boat once by bus once by hitching
let's get on a on a a helicopter why don't we?

and then I mean there are I I quite I mean I love going on boats anyway but I quite fancy the idea of if it's within our budget getting a boat trip out to one of the smaller islands or even just further up the coast to Split or something you know?
but that would be a probably a yeah

actually do you know what I didn't look for which I'd noticed when I was looking up the other end of the coast up Split way erm I was looking at national parks up there cos there's you know? lots of national parks and that would be

so you can take it in they check it if there's anything they think is slightly dodgy or might hold it up then they they get you to you know? take it back and bring it back again so that at least when you do finally submit it the pa to the pass passport office you're pretty much a hundred percent certain that there's not going to be any hold-ups that end
yeah but we don't want to do that we just want to get it in early enough don't we?
big run up to it yeah
time's passing quicker than you think though I must warn you
